lines.text: You know what the problem is. The problem is he's threatening to kill me!
You know I really believe there's a part of him that loves me, but it's like he's two people inside. Sometimes he can be really sweet.

[On phone with Police]
You know what the problem is, he's threatening to kill me! Look, I have a restraining order against him, and I want him picked up. Please hurry.
